title: Creating a Club tag in New Client
body:
Hello, 
I have created a new club and have 6 members so above the limit to have a club tag. Is there a way to create it. I have made the club but did not see an option to make the club tag?
Thanks

replies.body:
You can manage your club from the **PROFILE** tab up at the top, followed up by hitting the **CLUBS** Tab on the new page that pops up.

Let me know if this helped!

I'm having the same problem! The tab pops up but there is nowhere to create a tag. I clicked on settings and the "show this club tag" option is grayed out even though I have 6 members though have not had a chance to create a tag.

Can you swap over to the Legacy Client (if you are using the Beta) in case this can be remedied by creating the tag on the old client? You can access this from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this fixed the issue.

i figured it out
there is a lock next to your club name in the club profile tab, it should be unlocked.
click iot and it should bring the create club tag menu up
Once you get to the club menu theres a little padlock beside the clan name if you click on it you can make a tag. Its very hidden and took my 20 minutes to find.....
